statements.select: /* selectWtlLeakSubList - 누수지점 서브 목록 화면 */ SELECT FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , HJD_CDE , SHT_NUM , RCV_NUM , decode(length(LEK_YMD), 8, to_char(to_date(LEK_YMD, 'yyyyMMdd'), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), '') AS LEK_YMD , LEK_LOC , PIP_CDE , PIP_IDN , LRS_CDE , LEP_CDE , REP_YMD , REP_EXP , MAT_DES , REP_NAM , SYS_CHK , LEK_EXP , MOP_CDE , PIP_DIP /*관구경*/ FROM WTL_LEAK_PS WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN# ORDER BY FTR_CDE DESC , FTR_IDN DESC;

SELECT ATT_IDN , FTR_CDE , FTR_IDN , ATT_NAM , ATT_DES , ATTA_SEQ FROM WTT_ATTA_DT WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE=#FTR_CDE# AND FTR_CDE=#FTR_CDE#
ATT_IDN = #ATT_IDN#
FTR_CDE LIKE '%' || #FTR_CDE# || '%'
ORDER BY ATT_IDN DESC
